content: विस्मि {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To wonder or be surprised at; उभयोर्न तथा लोकः प्रावीण्येन विसिष्मिये <ls>R. 15. 68</ls>; उद्वीक्ष्य को भुवि न विस्मयते नगेशं <ls>Śi. 4. 19</ls>, <ls>Bk. 5. 51.</ls> {@--2@} To admire. {@--3@} To be proud or conceited; न विस्मयेत तपसा <ls>Ms. 4. 236.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to smile, cause to be surprised, fill with wonder or astonishment; विस्मापयन् विस्मितमात्मवृत्तौ <ls>R. 2. 33</ls>; <ls>Bk. 5. 58</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">8. 42.</ls>
